Title: Conceiving, designing and trailing a short-form measure of job quality: a proof-of-concept study
Abstract: © 2019 The Authors Industrial Relations Journal published by Brian Towers (BRITOW) and John Wiley & Sons LtdThe government has accepted the Taylor Review's recommendation that it should report annually on job quality in the UK. This article argues that three principles need to be followed in choosing the right measures and shows how these principles have been used to create a short job quality quiz (www.howgoodismyjob.com).
